Translations.Text: a eka kitaba che je tamari tarapha etala mate avatarita karavamam avi che ke, tame a (kura'ana) vade lokone saceta karo, to tamara hrdayamam ana vise jaraya sankoca na karaso, ane sikhamana che, imanavala'o mate
Tame loko tenum anusarana karo, je tamara palanahara taraphathi avi che ane allaha ta'alane chodine juththa lokonum anusarana na karo, tame loko ghani ja ochi sikhamana prapta karo cho
ane ghani vasti'one ame nasta kari didhi ane te'o para amaro prakopa ratrina samaye pahoncyo, athava evi sthitimam ke te'o baporana samaye arama kari rahya hata
to je samaye te'o para amaro prakopa avyo, te samaye te'o'e phakata evum ja kahyum ke kharekhara ame atyacari hata
pachi ame te lokone jarura savala karisum, je lokoni pase payagambara avya hata ane ame payagambarone jarura savala karisum
pachi, ame jo ke dareka vatani khabara rakhi'e chi'e, te'oni same kahi da'isum ane ame thodanka pana ajana na hata
ane te divase vajana pana sace ja thase, pachi je vyaktinum paladum bhare hase, to eva loko saphala thase
ane je vyaktinum paladum halakum hase, to te eva loko hase je'o'e potanum nukasana kari lidhum, amari ayato sathe atireka karavana karane
ane ni:Sanka ame tamane dharati para raheva mate jagya api ane ame tamara mate temam rojino samana banavyo, tame loko thodoka ja abhara mano cho
